Argument.helpKey: Path to the directory under which the export structure will be placed.
Argument.name: basePath

Argument.helpKey: If true, all IDs and created/modified timestamps will be removed in the exported files.
Argument.name: removeIDs

Argument.helpKey: If true, CDATA sections will be added where appropriate in the XML and the code will be unescaped.
Argument.name: addCData

Argument.helpKey: Comma-separated list of class names to export. If blank, all classes will be exported. Use 'default' for a default set of classes, or use default in the list e.g. 'default,Scope,Bundle'
Argument.name: classNames
Argument.Prompt: Classes to export (leave blank for all, use 'default' for a default set of classes)

Argument.helpKey: Regex to match names of objects that should be exported. If left blank, objects will not be filtered on name.
Argument.name: regexFilter
Argument.Prompt: Only include objects with names matching this regular expression

Argument.helpKey: Strip out metadata that is not usually useful when migrating between environments, such as TaskDefinition statistics and aggregation timestamps on Applications.
Argument.name: stripMetadata

Argument.helpKey: Only objects that have been created or updated after this date will be included in the export.
Argument.name: fromDate
Argument.Prompt: Only include objects updated or created after this date

Argument.helpKey: Leave blank for default naming format or choose a naming format with the following optional variables: $Class$ = Object Class, $Name$ = Object Name
Argument.name: namingFormat
Argument.Prompt: Naming format (see help text for variables)

Argument.helpKey: Optional - enter the path to a target.properties file for replacement of values with SSB tokens from the file. Leave blank if not required.
Argument.name: targetPropsFile
Argument.Prompt: target.properties file for reverse-tokenization for SSB

Argument.helpKey: Optional - enter the path to a directory containing XML files for merge comparisons for supported classes. Leave blank if not required.
Argument.name: mergeCompareDirPath
Argument.Prompt: Directory containing original XML files for comparison when creating merge files
